mapper.select: select * from (select * from ${tableName} order by opdate desc) where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into CBONDFUTURESEODPRICES ( object_id, s_info_windcode, trade_dt, s_dq_presettle, s_dq_open, s_dq_high, s_dq_low, s_dq_close, s_dq_settle, s_dq_volume, s_dq_amount, s_dq_oi, s_dq_change, opdate, opmode, imp_date, imp_time ) values ( #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoWindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dDqPresettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqHigh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqLow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqClose,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqSettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqVolume,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqOi,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqChange,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{opdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{opmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{impTime,jdbcType=CHAR} )
